Help

Enhancements & Bugs

To request enhancements or report problems, please visit

https://stevesea.github.io/Adventuresmith/

Usage

Sharing Results

Long-click on one or more result items to select them, click the share button.

Favorites

Long-click on a blue generator button to add it to favorites

Long-click on `Favorites` expandable item in nav drawer to create new favorite groups

Long-click on favorite group in nav drawer to rename it

Long-click on an empty favorite group in nav drawer to remove it

Long-click on a favorite-button to remove it from the currently displayed favorite group

Generate Many

In the nav drawer, click the `Generate Many Results` switch to generate more than one result with each click of a generator button.

If you long-click on `Generate Many Results`, you can select how many results to generate each time

Advanced Usage

If you are interested in creating generators, adding translations, or want to run Adventuresmith on the desktop, check out the wiki:

https://github.com/stevesea/Adventuresmith/wiki
